name: Dexerto Dark 2022
description: Dark theme for updated 2022 dexerto.com design, re-using the existing dark blue. Very simple, yet effective.
additional_info: PS: I feel the new 2022 website WordPress style is seriously ugly and can use some significant improvements like way less unused space, no more Web 1.0 looking links, better shadow-boxes, rounded box borders, etc. If ya’ll are interested in me adding it to the userstyle, please let me know … Changelog 2022-08-09 - Support for new website WordPress layout. 2020-08-26 - Darkened landingspage carousel background. 2019-11-13 - Updated to reflect the minor CSS changes in the website design.
